DOC.brief_summary: This study is attempting to understand whether or not splinting after a fingertip injury improves recovery.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Splinting in Fingertip Injuries
DOC.criteria: injury distal to flexor and extensor tendon insertions crush, avulsion, amputation, or penetrating injury to the fingertip isolated injury, within two weeks operative fixation required unable to participate in rehab
